metadata.name: GOLD DUST
metadata.description:
GOLD DUST is a weekly reward for holders of a GOLD DUST BOX, which can only be acquired by holding a combined weight of 35.2g per wallet holder/collector, one time only, or via secondary sale.

 GOLD DUST is assigned to eligible wallets every TUESDAY and must be redeemed within 3 days of assignment. All you need to do is sign and use gas.
